entries.title: Sister Mira Vey
entries.summary: Confessor envoy murdered by Elara; her breath is kept by Asha.

entries.title: Lord Theron
entries.summary: Noble killed by Elara; his widow is now the Quartermaster.

entries.title: The Quartermaster
entries.summary: Theron’s widow; funds strikes on Elara’s lines.

entries.title: Mira’s Pearl
entries.summary: A single rosary pearl taken by Elara; proof and leverage.

entries.title: Confessor Seal
entries.summary: Official mark granting temporary sanctuary or writ; tradable favor.

entries.title: Eden Clue #2
entries.summary: The Tower’s heart beats in the Hollow Courts.
